meaningMnemonic: If you try to <radical>go</radical> somewhere but you're too <radical>heavy</radical> you'll <kanji>collide</kanji> with everything. Cars, people, houses. You're too heavy to dodge them, so you collide with it all.
readingMnemonic: You're going around the town, you <kanji>collide</kanji> with a bunch of things, when all of a sudden you collide with the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう)! Oh no! The shogun looks really mad.
